name: Gojek (Merchant Payment)
description:
About

Copying is a great way to become truly intimate with a piece of art, an app, or software application and learn how it was designed.


And this is an example of how I'm trying to be intimate with an app with high artistic value (imho), the Gojek App.


Little Things

I took a screenshot as a reference to create a UI on a specific page. The colors and typography are from eye drops I made from screenshots, so it's likely different colors or messy color documentation and inappropriate typography.


-------------------------------

Ps.

Use this file wisely.
